thread.title: EPA policy flicks switch on power plant fight
thread.title_full: EPA policy flicks switch on power plant fight

author: Mike Mullen
title: EPA policy flicks switch on power plant fight
text:
Home / News / Energy / EPA policy flicks switch on power plant fight The Sherco facility in Becker is the region’s largest coal-burning plant. (File photo: Bill Klotz) EPA policy flicks switch on power plant fight By: Mike Mullen September 23, 2015 3:13 pm 0 State Rep. Pat Garofalo, R-Farmington, wants Minnesota to receive full marks for a job well done before moving on to the next assignment. Minnesota Democrats, at least some of them, are acting like teacher’s pets and looking to rack up some extra credit. Garofalo staged a Monday press conference and a public hearing, the first of ...
